verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beeri \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w reigns|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, Ahaz, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. The adultery of Hosea’s wife

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w began|strong="H8462"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*: ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H2181"\w* woman \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w adultery|strong="H2181"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3212"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w adulterous|strong="H2181"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H2181"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.’

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Dibliam, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*: ‘\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* “\w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*,” \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dynasty|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* valley \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.’

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H7121"\w*: ‘\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w Lo-Ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w* – “No-Compassion” \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w certainly|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.’

After she \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* No-Compassion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H1121"\w* said:

‘\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Lo-Ammi|strong="H3818"\w* – “Not-My-People” \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*, \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.’

Yet the number of the Israelites will be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured or counted, and where they were told, ‘You are not my people,’ they will be called, ‘children of the living God.’
The Judeans and the Israelites will join together again, will appoint for themselves one leader, will return to their own land. Great will be the day of Jezreel!
